customToolkitSettings.commandLine: source /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.4.196/linux/mpi/intel64/bin/mpivars.sh; cat /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2017.4.196/linux/mpi/intel64/bin/mpivars.sh; echo $AZ_BATCH_HOST_LIST; ifconfig -a; mpirun -n 1 -ppn 1 -hosts $AZ_BATCH_HOST_LIST python /benchmarks/scripts/tf_cnn_benchmarks/tf_cnn_benchmarks.py --model resnet50 --batch_size 64 --variable_update horovod
